702355f-a.text:
4th Place, south side, between Court and Smith Streets. The view shows
the South Congregational Chapel.
June 25, 1921.
P. L. Sperr.

702354f-a.text:
Fourth Place, east from, but not including Court, to and including Smith Streets. The view shows several gas tanks of the Brooklyn Union Gas
Company.
June 25, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.

703854f-a.text:
Court Street, east side, south from 4th Place. At Luquer Street is St. Mary Star of the Sea Roman Catholic Church.
September 7, 1940
P.  . Sperr  N6 RErRODUCTIONs
